Package jetbrains.mps.nodeEditor.highlighter

Class HighlighterEditorTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • jetbrains.mps.nodeEditor.highlighter.HighlighterEditorTracker
  • public class HighlighterEditorTracker
extends Object
    Tracks the checked/unchecked state of editors and inspector. NOT thread-safe.

      Only activeEditors remain in myCheckedOnceEditors, forcing all checkers to createMessages() on next visible (active) editor change.

        Marks all editors and the inspector unchecked.

      • markOnlyEditorsChecked

        public void markOnlyEditorsChecked​(List<EditorComponent> activeEditors)
        Only activeEditors remain in myCheckedOnceEditors, forcing all checkers to createMessages() on next visible (active) editor change. Inspector checked state is not affected.

      • markInspectorUnchecked

        public void markInspectorUnchecked()
